roleset.name: characterized by wisdom

role.descr: that characterized as wise (may require concatenation)

example.name: concatenation
example.text: Other developing nations would be wise to realise that western powers have a stake in preventing the development of nations they consider inferior particularly Asian , African and South American nations .
example.arg: [other developing nations] [to realise that western powers have a stake in preventing the development of nations they consider inferior particularly Asian, African and South American nations]

example.name: lexicalized comparative rel
example.text: In the very long run I think being outside of Europe and trading with the emerging economies , which will eventually become the big economies , is wiser .
example.arg: being outside of Europe and trading with the emerging economies , which will eventually become the big economies

example.name: both args
example.text: This time , the fire department and police who stuck around were wise to the shenanigans going on , and we were only kept out for a few minutes .
